p.e:
Most actions have a chance to roll an 
attack, what this means is that you will
roll another dice to choose what has 
attacked you.

"Monsters" have two stats, health, and 
range. if you kill a monster it will drop
corresponding loot.

If you have a weapon there are three 
stats to determine who won, type, 
damage, and the strength of your 
character. If the range of your weapon is
not higher than the monsters you 
subtract both numbers. to determine how
much damage you do add the strenght of
your character plus the damage then 
divide by 2
